if(itemId == 3062) {
c.getItems().addItem(560, 200);
c.getItems().addItem(555, 200);
c.getItems().addItem(568, 200);
c.getItems().deleteItem(3062, 1);
}

item.title: Making a package give barrage runes
item.dc:creator: @UnholyVeng UnholyVeng
item.description:
@UnholyVeng wrote:

Hello guys. How would I make a package give barrage runes? This is the code I’m using

if(itemId == 3062) { c.getItems().addItem(560, 200); c.getItems().deleteItem(3062, 1); } It only gives deaths atm cause I’m not sure if I should add a comma or what to make it give more than one item.
